entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
